net.sf.jameleon.function
Class ContextHelper

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.jameleon.function.ContextHelper

public final class ContextHelper
extends java.lang.Object

The ContextHelper class is used as a helper class to remove the context-specific calls from Jameleon Tags.

          This class was not meant to be instantiated
